    • openid-vars.js

    import * as log from './logger';

/**
 * We've got 3 possible versions of ping. QA, DEV and PROD
 * Generate the correct variables based on this
 * Use an IIFE in the module constructor to immediately process and return
 */
let url = 'https://federate-qa.xh1.lilly.com';
if (process.env.PING_VERSION === 'DEV') {
  url = 'https://federate-dev.xh1.lilly.com';
} else if (process.env.PING_VERSION === 'PROD') {
  url = 'https://federate.xh1.lilly.com';
}

let tempIssuer;

if (process.env.OPENID_ISSUER) {
  log.info('Using OPENID_ISSUER and OPENID_TOKEN_URL vars');
  tempIssuer = process.env.OPENID_ISSUER;
} else {
  log.info('Using PING_VERSION to determine OPENID variables');
  tempIssuer = url;
}

log.info(`Using ${tempIssuer} as issuer`);

const issuer = tempIssuer;

export default issuer;

    Generated by JSDoc 3.6.3 on Thu Oct 10 2019 14:52:11 GMT+0100 (British Summer Time) using the Minami theme.
